TITLE: Item 2.02
TEXT: ITEM 2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. On November 1, 2025, Berkshire Hathaway Inc. issued a press release announcing the Company’s earnings for the third quarter and first nine months ended September 30, 2025. A copy of this press release is furnished with this report as an exhibit to this Form 8-K.
